unit.name: Aatrox

ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.description:
On cast, Aatrox cycles through one of the following abilities:

Slash in a line, dealing [170/255/2500] (AD + AP) physical damage to enemies hit and 20% Sundering them for 4 seconds.

Swipe in a cone, dealing [204/306/3000] (AD + AP) physical damage to enemies hit and knocking them up for 1 second.

Slam on target, dealing [272/408/4000] (AD + AP) physical damage in a 1 hex circle. Targets below 15% max Health are executed.

unit.unlock: Field a unit with 40% Omnivamp in Combat + Level 8

ability.name: Fox-Fire
ability.description:
Fire 3 flames at target, each dealing [85/130/200](AP) magic damage. Every 3rd cast, fire 9 flames split between the target and up to 2 nearby enemies.

If there are nearby enemies, dash away.

ability.name: Lacerate
ability.description: Swipe and dash around target, dealing [50/75/325](AD + AP) physical damage to enemies in the path. Then slam chains on target, dealing [138/206/894](AD + AP) physical damage in a line. If any enemies are killed, immediately recast this ability, dealing 100% damage.

ability.name: Frostbite
ability.description: Fire an ice shard at target that deals [325/455/650](AP) magic damage. If they are Chilled, the damage Critically Strikes.

ability.name: Enraged Inferno
ability.description:
Erupt the entire battlefield in flames, permanently Burning and Wounding all enemies and dealing [1500/2250/8000](AP) magic damage to each of them over 45 seconds.

Annie's max Mana is reduced by 150 for the rest of combat. Subsequent casts launch a fireball at target that deals [240/360/3000](AP) magic damage.

ability.name: Incendiary Onslaught
ability.description:
Start with Infernum equipped. On cast, switch to Severum for [8](AP) attacks.

Infernum: Attacks hit 3 enemies and apply 30% Sunder for 6 seconds.
Severum: Gain 200% Attack Speed and 10% Omnivamp. Attacks are replaced with swipes that deal [70/105/175](AD) physical damage.

ability.name: True Ice Arrow
ability.description:
Fire an arrow at target that deals [140/210/325](AD + AP) physical damage to them and [46/69/107](AD + AP) damage to adjacent enemies. Targets below 30% max Health take true damage instead. 30% Chill all enemies hit for 3 seconds.

Bloodsworn Bond: When you field Ashe and Tryndamere, your strongest copies permanently increase their power on kill.

unit.name: Aurelion Sol

ability.name: The Skies Descend
ability.description:
Passive: After dealing ability damage to an enemy, gain Stardust. Stardust makes The Skies Descend more powerful. (Current Stardust: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_AurelionSol_Stardust@)

Active: Crash a star on target, dealing [400/600/5000](AP) magic damage in a 2 hex radius.

Stardust Upgrades:
15: Create a shockwave that deals [50/75/1000](AP) additional magic damage in a 3 Hex radius.
60: The star crash deals 12% more damage.
100: Shockwave increases to a 4 hex radius.
175: Knock up targets in the star crash for 2 seconds.
250: Shockwave increases to 10 radius.
400: The star crash deals 25% bonus true damage.
600: Also call down a meteor storm that deals [1000/1500/9999](AP) magic damage split between living enemies.
1199: Summon a black hole at the epicenter, instantly killing enemies within.

unit.unlock: Field Targon 5 in Combat

ability.name: Arise!
ability.description:
Passive: After witnessing 3 attacks from Azir, Sand Soldiers deal [100/150/3000](AP) magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier near target and command them to strike. If 2 Soldiers are already out, they all immediately deal [70/105/1500](AP) magic damage instead.

unit.name: Bard

ability.name: Traveler's Call
ability.description: Launch 6 Meeps at nearby enemies that deal [105/160/240](AP) magic damage. Add an additional Meep for each 3-star unit on your board. (Total Meeps: @TFT16_Bard_Num3Stars@)

unit.unlock: Reroll 4 times before Stage 2 Carousel

unit.name: Baron Nashor

ability.name: Wrath of the Void
ability.description:
Passive: Immune to Crowd Control effects. Attacks deal damage in a line on target. If no enemies are in range, dash to the next one and knock up adjacent enemies on arrival.

While in the Void Rift, erupt a tentacle below a random enemy every 3/3/0.25 seconds that knocks them up for 1.5 seconds.

Active: Slam and erect spikes in a 2 hex circle, dealing [280/420/20500](AD + AP) physical damage to enemies hit. Then over 3 seconds, spit 10 globs of acid that deal [140/210/10250](AD + AP) physical damage.

unit.unlock: Level 10 + Void 7

ability.name: Endless Banquet
ability.description:
Passive: On takedown, gain [100/100/200]% stacking Attack Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

Active: Deal [150/225/900](AD) physical damage in a 2 hex radius and transform for the rest of combat.

While transformed, gain [33/33/133]%(AP) Attack Speed, 33% max Health, and increased Move Speed. Attacks deal [15/25/100] bonus true damage, increased by [3/5/25] for each time the same enemy is hit.

ability.name: Static Field
ability.description: Gain [325/400/500](AP) Shield for 4 seconds and deal [56/84/126](MR) magic damage to all enemies within 1 hex.

ability.name: Unbreakable Frost
ability.description: Raise shield for 4 seconds, gaining [55/55/90]%(AP) Durability and redirecting projectiles to towards Braum instead. When hit, deal [27/43/1180](Armor + AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and 30% Chill them for 2 seconds.

ability.name: Blood Frenzy
ability.description: Leap to the furthest enemy within 3 hexes. For 4 seconds gain increased Move Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and [300](AP)% decaying Attack Speed.

unit.name: Brock

ability.name: Seismic Slam
ability.description:
Passive: Immune to crowd control effects. Attacks briefly knock up the target and deal 50% damage in a 1 hex radius around them.

Active: Slam the ground, dealing [190/272/1630](Health + AD) physical damage to ALL enemies, reduced by 15% for each hex from the center (down to 40%.) If this is the first time they've been hit by Seismic Slam this combat, knock them up for up to 1.75 seconds. [12/12/99] rocks fall around the battlefield, each dealing [270/405/700](AD + AP) physical damage to enemies hit.

unit.unlock: Collect 500 Ixtal Clues total

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: Fire a bullet towards the farthest enemy, dealing [515/775/1205](AD + AP) physical damage to the first enemy it hits. If they die, the bullet ricochets, dealing excess damage to the next enemy hit.

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description: Restore [180/200/250](AP) Health and rupture a 2 hex circle beneath target. After a brief delay, enemies within are knocked up for 1.5 seconds and take [88/152/248](Health + AP) magic damage.

unit.name: Darius

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description:
Restore [250/352/512](Health + AP) Health and spin, dealing [90/135/210](AD) physical damage to adjacent enemies and applying a stack of Hemorrhage that deals [15/25/40](AD) physical damage each second for 4 seconds.

If an enemy with Hemorrhage drops below 8% Health, slam on them, instantly killing them. (Each stack increases the execute threshold by 5%)

unit.unlock: Have Draven drop 1 gold

unit.name: Diana

ability.name: Lunar Rush
ability.description:
Passive: Ability damage from your strongest Leona and strongest Diana marks enemies as Moonlit, reducing their damage by 10%.

Active: Gain [200/250/300](AP) Shield for 2 seconds. Unleash a bolt of lunar energy at the farthest non-Moonlit enemy within 4 hexes, dealing [165/250/500](AP) magic damage. Then, dash to all Moonlit enemies, dealing [150/225/1250](AP) magic damage to them.

unit.unlock: Field a 2-star Leona with 3 items in combat

ability.name: Maximum Dosage
ability.description: Bulk up for 5 seconds. While bulked, restore [114/177/275](Health + AP) Health every second and attacks deal [105/171/291](Health + AD) physical damage.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description:
Passive: If Draven has an empowered axe in hand, his next attack will throw it. On takedown, gain an Adoration stack, doubled if Draven or Darius scored the kill. Every 11 Adoration stacks grants [1/3/5] Gold.

Active: Spin an empowered axe that replaces his basic attack and deals [150/225/375](AD + AP) physical damage and returns to Draven after hitting an enemy.

ability.name: Parallel Convergence
ability.description:
Create a 1 hex zone around the target that lasts 3 seconds. The next 3 attacks deal [115/175/260](AP) bonus magic damage.

When the zone ends, it deals [130/195/295](AP) magic damage + 10% of the target's damage taken during the duration to all enemies in the zone.

ability.name: Crowstorm
ability.description: Teleport into the largest cluster of enemies and Stun them for [1.75/1.75/99] seconds. Begin losing 20 mana per second. While casting, deal [95/140/6666](AP) magic damage per second to all enemies within a 2 hex radius. The closest 2 enemies take 33% more damage.

unit.name: Fizz

ability.name: Playful Trickster
ability.description: Become briefly untargetable, then jump to the farthest enemy within 4 hexes and deal [75/115/300](AP) magic damage to adjacent enemies. For the next 4 attacks, gain 50% Attack Speed and deal [70/105/450](AP) bonus magic damage on hit.

unit.unlock: Field 5 Yordles or Bilgewater units + Level 7

unit.name: Galio

ability.name: Inspirational Might
ability.description:
Passive: Every 3rd attack deals [247/371/5850](MR) magic damage in a circle around the target.

Active: Dash into the largest group of units and inspire all allies within 2 hexes, granting them [500/600/2000](AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Then crash down, dealing [293/439/3250](MR) bonus magic damage to all enemies with 2 hexes.

unit.unlock: 12 star levels of Demacia

ability.name: Powder Kegs
ability.description: Toss barrels at the 3 nearest enemies and detonate them. They deal [200/300/475](AD + AP) damage, reduced by 20% for each barrel in the chain. Barrels reduce their target's Armor by 10, increased to 30 if the damage critically strikes.

ability.name: Judgment
ability.description: Spin for 3 seconds, gaining [50/50/90]% Durability and healing for [420/566/1389](Health + AP) over the duration. Each second, deal [100/150/1700](AD) physical damage to adjacent enemies and reduce their Armor and Magic Resistance by 5.

ability.name: Collateral Damage
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks fire in a cone on target, dealing 45% damage to other enemies hit.

Active: Fire an explosive shell at target, dealing [190/285/430](AD) physical damage split among enemies in a 1 hex circle.

Partners in Crime: When you field Graves and Twisted Fate, both gain bonuses.

ability.name: Switcheroo!

unit.name: Kennen

ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ability.description: Gain [600/700/900](AP) Shield and summon storm of lightning. 6 waves of bolts hit enemies within, dealing [120/180/290](AP) magic damage over 3 seconds. The first 3 targets to be struck by 3 bolts are Stunned for 1.5 seconds. Multiple Stuns on the same enemy have 50% effectiveness.

ability.description:
Dash, then create a 2-hex radius zone for [2.5/2.5/99] seconds that prevents allies within from dying. While active, double current Attack Speed and on attack, fire a secondary arrow at a nearby enemy that deals [25/38/999](AD) physical damage.

When the zone ends, heal all allies for [8]%(AP) of damage dealt while it was up and dash away.

unit.name: Kobuko & Yuumi

ability.name: You & Me!
ability.description:
Passive: Yuumi joins your strongest Kobuko. Every 3 seconds, she alternates between healing the lowest Health ally for [140/180/240](AP) Health or granting [25/33/50]% Attack Speed to the ally who has dealt the most damage for 4 seconds.

Active: Dance, restoring [176/277/446](Health + AP) Health over 3 seconds.

ability.name: Caustic Spittle
ability.description: Deal [140/200/300](AP) magic damage to target and reduce their Armor and Magic Resist by [8/10/15]. Adjacent enemies are dealt 50% of the damage and effect.

unit.name: LeBlanc

ability.name: Distortions
ability.description: Summon 3 dashing mirror images that strike the target and up to 2 other nearby enemies. The target takes [250/375/580](AP) magic damage and is Stunned for 1 second, while other units hit take [140/210/325](AP) magic damage.

ability.name: Solar Flare
ability.description:
Passive: Reduce instances of incoming damage by [15/40/80](AP).

Active: Call down sun beams on the 3 nearest enemies, Stunning them for 1 second and dealing [90/130/220](AP) magic damage. Wound and 1% Burn them for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Frozen Tomb
ability.description:
Encase target in ice, Stunning them for 1 second and dealing [275/415/2500](AP) magic damage. All enemies within 2 hexes of them split [415/625/2800](AP) magic damage. If the target dies, shards fly out and split excess damage between the 2 nearest enemies.

Chilled enemies take 12% more damage from this ability.

ability.name: Piltover Tussle
ability.description: Gain [700/800/1000](AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Charge and knock the target backwards, Stunning them and units hit for 1.25 seconds and dealing [150/225/360](AP) magic damage to them. After charging, force nearby enemies to target this unit.

ability.name: The Culling
ability.description: Fire [12/12/42](AS) shots towards target. Each shot explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing [98/147/900](AD + AP) physical damage to all nearby enemies. If an enemy is afflicted with Black Mist, purify them, immediately draining their Armor for the total amount.

ability.name: Whimsy
ability.description: Deal [280/420/630](AP) magic damage to target and make them dance for 2 seconds. The projectile then bounces to the nearest target, dealing [120/180/270](AP) magic damage.

ability.name: Final Spark
ability.description: Fire a ball of light at the most enemies, dealing [30/45/100](AP) magic damage to the first 2 enemies hit and Rooting them for 1 second. Then fire a beam, dealing [290/435/1500](AP) magic damage to enemies hit by the ball and [90/135/800](AP) magic damage to all other enemies hit.

ability.name: Void Swarm
ability.description: Summon 2 Voidlings that each attack a nearby enemy 10 times. Each attack deals [30/45/80](AP) magic damage.

unit.name: Mel

ability.name: Radiant Eclipse
ability.description:
Passive: While gaining Mana, throw out [2/2/9] radiant orbs that orbit around target. They deal [40/60/90](AP) magic damage in a 1 hex radius and drain 1 Mana from enemies hit each second. After draining 250/250/10 mana, gain a random Radiant Item. (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_Mel_ManaSpent@/250/250/10)

Active: Detonate orbs on target, causing a 3 hex radius explosion that deals [1000/1500/10000](AP) magic damage to them and [500/750/10000](AP) damage to all other enemies hit.

unit.unlock: 2-star Ambessa with 1 item dies

ability.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick!!!
ability.description: Launch a fuemigo at target that bounces 3 times, dealing [180/270/420](AP) magic damage to enemies hit. The last bounce deals [160/240/375](AP) magic damage to enemies in a 1 hex radius.

ability.name: Heartbreaker
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks ricochet to the highest current Health enemy, dealing 50% damage.

Active: Fire waves of bullets that land on the 2 nearest enemies. The first wave deals [130/200/670](AD + AP) physical damage and the rest deal [85/130/436](AD + AP) physical damage. Every 3rd cast, increase the number of waves by 1.

ability.description: Gain [330/410/500](AP) Shield for 4 seconds and deal [70/105/165](AD) physical damage to target. After a delay, briefly knock them up and deal the damage again. Bucklers fly out from the target, granting 2 nearby allies 30% of the Shield gained.

ability.name: Runic Overload
ability.description:
Release a runic blast, dealing [280/420/1500](AP) magic damage. It splits in two, dealing 33% of the damage to the closest two enemies. Each secondary blast splits an additional time.

Bilgewater: Blasts explode on impact, dealing 20% of the damage as physical damage to adjacent enemies.
Demacia: Execute targets below [15]%(Armor/MR) Health.
Freljord: Chill targets for 4 seconds and deal [55/99/178](Health) bonus true damage.
Ionia: Blasts split an additional time.
Ixtal: Gain a random Region's effect on combat start and every 10 seconds.
Noxus: Blasts now pierce targets, dealing 60% reduced damage per enemy hit.
Piltover: Every third cast is Overcharged, dealing 40% more damage.
Shadow Isles: Increase blast damage by [5]%(Souls).
Targon: Heal the lowest Health ally for 10% of the damage dealt.
Void: Ignore 30% of enemies' Armor and Magic Resistance.
Yordle: Shrink targets hit, lowering their damage by 12% percent for 4 seconds.
Zaun: Poison targets, dealing [20/30/500] magic damage [3.1/3.1/3.5](AS) times over 4 seconds.

unit.unlock: Collect 150 Souls

ability.name: Buster Shot
ability.description: Fire a massive cannonball at target, dealing [280/420/635](AD + AP) physical damage. If they are within 2 hexes, knock them back 2 hexes and briefly Stun them.

unit.name: Tryndamere

ability.name: Undying Rage
ability.description:
Become enraged for 5 seconds. While enraged, gain [25](AP)% Durability and attacks are replaced with a strike that deals [120/180/270](AD) physical damage. Ignore 30% of Armor against Chilled enemies.

Bloodsworn Bond: When you field Ashe and Tryndamere, your strongest copies permanently increase their power on kill.

unit.unlock: Field an Ashe with 2 items in combat

ability.name: Stacked Deck
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks deal [30/45/70](AP) bonus magic damage. After every 3rd attack, throw 3 cards in a cone that deal [70/105/160](AP) magic damage, reduced by 50% for each enemy they pass through.

Partners in Crime: When you field Graves and Twisted Fate, both gain bonuses.

ability.name: Tumble
ability.description: Tumble to a nearby hex, then fire a bolt at target that deals [106/160/245](AD + AP) true damage.

unit.name: Veigar

ability.name: Dark Storm
ability.description:
Passive: Gain 50% more Ability Power from all sources.

Active: Call down a storm of [12/12/24] meteors across the battlefield that deal [60/90/135](AP) magic damage each. They can innately critically strike. For each one that kills an enemy, permanently gain 1 Ability Power.

unit.unlock: Field a unit with 2 Rabadon's Deathcaps in combat

ability.name: Relentless Force
ability.description: Gain [125/150/175](AP) Shield for 2 seconds. Slam on target, dealing [110/165/250](AD) physical damage to enemies in a 1 hex range. Every third cast deals [140/210/315](AD) damage in a 2 hex range instead and knocks up enemies hit for 1 second.

ability.name: Blade of the Ruined King
ability.description:
Passive: Gain 10%(Souls) Attack Speed. 

Active: Deal [55/85/125](AD) physical damage to target. For the rest of combat, Viego's attacks deal [24/36/54](AP) bonus stacking magic damage.

unit.name: Volibear

ability.name: The Relentless Storm
ability.description:
Bite the target and mark them, dealing [136/215/2117](AD + Health) physical damage, increased by 60% if they are already marked. After casting [5/5/2] times, leap to a nearby hex, activating Stormbringer and dealing [272/430/4233](Health + AD) physical damage to enemies within a two hex radius.

Stormbringer: Gain [400/550/9999] Health and [50/50/999]% Attack Speed. Every [2/2/0.3] seconds, summon a lightning bolt on a nearby enemy, dealing [98/161/1155](Health + AP) magic damage. Takedowns summon a bolt on fallen enemies.

unit.unlock: Level 8 + have a unit with 3800 Health

unit.name: Warwick

ability.name: Eternal Hunger
ability.description: Gain [100/100/400]% Attack Speed, 15% Omnivamp, increased Move Speed, and deal [45/70/550](AD) bonus physical damage on attack for the rest of combat. While this effect is active, takedowns grant Warwick, Jinx, and Vi [20/20/50]%(AP) Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

unit.unlock: 2-star Jinx & 2-star Vi

ability.name: Diverting Trickster
ability.description:
Passive: On death, summon a Stone copy with [570/956/3361](Health) Health and Wukong's items.

Active: For 4 seconds, gain [100/110/400](AP) Armor and Magic Resist. Then spin, dealing [150/225/3000](AD) physical damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

unit.name: Xerath

ability.name: Eye of the Ascendant
ability.description: Launch [10/10/99] arcane blasts randomly split between the closest [4/4/10] enemies that each deal [500/750/2500](AP) magic damage.

unit.unlock: Alternate winning and losing 3/4/5 times with Azir

ability.name: Three Talon Strike
ability.description: Strike target 3 times. Each strike deals [65/100/150](AD) physical damage and restores [95/135/170](AP) Health. The final one Stuns for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Sweeping Blade
ability.description:
Dash, then deal [81/124/189](AD + AP) physical damage to adjacent enemies. If only one enemy is hit, deal double damage.

Blade Brothers: When you field Yasuo and Yone, Yasuo assists Yone's casts.

unit.name: Yone

ability.name: Kin of the Stained Blade
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks alternate between dealing [80/120/800](AD) bonus physical damage and [140/210/1400](AP) bonus magic damage.

Active: Strike through the most enemies possible within 3 hexes, knocking them up for 1.5 seconds and dealing [80/120/480](AD + AP) physical damage and [80/120/480](AD + AP) magic damage. Yone then splits [320/480/2160](AD + AP) physical damage and [320/480/2160](AD + AP) magic damage among all enemies hit.

Blade Brothers: When you field Yasuo and Yone, Yasuo assists Yone's casts.

unit.unlock: 3-star Yasuo

unit.name: Yorick

ability.name: Mourning Mist
ability.description: Restore [300/340/450](AP + Souls) Health. Throw a globule of black mist at the enemy who has dealt the most damage this combat, preferring unique enemies. It 20% Chills them for 4 seconds and raises the Mana cost of their next cast by 20. It then deals [123/187/288](Health) magic damage in 1 hex radius.

unit.unlock: Field a 2-star Viego with 2 items in combat.

ability.name: Transcendent State
ability.description: For the next 4 seconds, gain [75/75/300]%(AP) Attack Speed, infinite range, and replace attacks with lasers. Lasers deal [85/130/450](AD) physical damage in a line, reduced by 60/60/30% for each enemy they pass through. When lasers critically strike, they deal 33% bonus true damage.

unit.name: Zaahen

ability.name: Divine Challenge
ability.description:
Dash around target and slash in a circle, dealing [90/135/1700](AD + AP) physical damage to target and [23/34/425](AD + AP) physical damage to all other adjacent enemies hit. If the target doesn't die, immediately cast again.

If this Ability is cast 25 times in a row, instead slam on target, instantly killing them and dealing [180/270/3400](AD + AP) physical damage to all enemies within 3 hexes.

unit.unlock: Get the Xin Zhao Champion Augment + field a 3-star Xin Zhao for 5 rounds

unit.name: Ziggs

ability.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks are replaced with a bomb that bounces 1 time, dealing [30/45/500](AD + AP) magic damage to units hit.

Active: Throw an enormous bomb at the largest 4-hex group of enemies that explodes on impact, dealing between [70/105/3000](AP) and [550/825/7000](AP) magic damage to enemies hit based on their distance from the epicenter.

unit.unlock: Field a Yordle or Zaunite with 3 items and Level 9

ability.name: Visions of the End
ability.description:
Throw a Time Bomb on the nearest enemy without one. Time Bombs deal [75/115/1000](AP) magic damage each second. When the target dies, they explode, dealing [150/225/4000](AP) magic damage in a 1 hex radius and grant Zilean 15 mana.

If a Time Bomb is on an enemy for [18/16/1] seconds and Zilean is alive, the enemy instantly dies.

ability.name: Double Trouble Bubble
ability.description:
Passive: Damaging an enemy applies 30% Shred for 6 seconds.

Active: Kick 2 bubbles at nearby enemies, dealing [330/500/825](AP) magic damage and 30% Chilling them for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Summon: Tibbers
ability.description:
Passive: If Annie has Tibbers on the board, gain 10% Attack Speed. On cast, Annie heals herself and Tibbers. While Tibbers is on the board, Annie's attacks deal bonus magic damage.

Active: Annie summons Tibbers on the nearest open Hex. Tibbers lasts until Annie dies.

traits.name: Ascendant
traits.effect: After each combat, an Ascendant Charm appears in your shop. These are powerful effects that can be bought for gold.

traits.name: Assimilator
traits.effect: Kai'Sa has a different Ability depending if her Attack Damage or Ability Power is higher.

traits.name: Bilgewater
traits.effect: Each round, gain Silver Serpents (%i:scaleSerpents%), plus 2 additional for each Bilgewater takedown. Silver Serpents can be spent in the Black Market to grant Bilgewater champions bonus stats and special loot. Higher tiers unlock rarer loot. Current Bonus Stats: 0% Attack Damage, Ability Power, 0% Attack Speed, 0% Health. Current Serpents: 0 %i:scaleSerpents%

traits.name: Blacksmith
traits.effect: After each player combat your strongest Ornn participates in, he makes progress forging an Artifact item. Each item he is equipped with grants him 200/400/2000 max Health. Artifacts grant 300% more. Forging Progress: 0/4

traits.name: Caretaker
traits.effect: After winning player combat, gain a random unit from Runeterra. After losing combat, gain free rerolls, with the amount increasing by stage. Rerolls on Loss: 0

traits.name: Chainbreaker
traits.effect: Sylas rotates between 3 different Abilities, depending on which one is most useful at the moment. He cannot cast the same one twice in a row.

traits.name: Chronokeeper
traits.effect: Every 2 casts, the Chronokeeper stores 1 XP. If he has enough stored for you to level up, he transfers you the required XP. If you are level 10, he instead gains 15% Damage Amp. Stored XP: 0

traits.name: Dark Child
traits.effect: Annie summons Tibbers on your bench. He can be fielded, takes up a team slot, and can be equipped with items separately. His star level is the same as Annie's.

tiers.bonus: AND you heal for 25% of the player damage you deal.
AND whenever Darkin restore 100 Health, they deal 100 magic damage to the 2 closest enemies.

traits.name: Demacia
traits.effect: Each time your team loses 25% max Health, Demacians rally, reducing their Mana cost by 10%. Demacians gain Armor and Magic Resist.

tiers.bonus: 25 Armor & Magic Resist. On rally, smite enemies for 5% of their max Health.
150 Armor & Magic Resist. BATTLE FOR DEMACIA!

traits.name: Dragonborn
traits.effect: On cast, Shyvana replaces her spell with Flame Breath. While transformed, all allies take 10% less damage from enemy Abilities.

traits.name: Emperor
traits.effect: Azir deploys two Guards who can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. They do not move or attack, and die when Azir does.

traits.name: Eternal
traits.effect: Every 3rd attack from Kindred on the same enemy deals 350% damage, as Wolf mauls their target.

traits.name: Freljord
traits.effect: Summon a Frozen Tower. Allies in front of it gain Health and allies behind it gain Damage Amp. Freljordians gain 150% more.

tiers.bonus: Towers stun enemies on death for 1.5 seconds. 16% Health, 22% Damage Amplification.

traits.name: Glutton
traits.effect: Once per Planning phase, you can feed Tahm Kench a champion, permanently granting him either Health, Attack Speed, or Ability Power based on their role and star level. To feed, hold an ally from the bench over Tahm Kench until his mouth opens, then release. Current Stats: 0 Health, 0% Attack Speed, 0% Ability Power

traits.name: Harvester
traits.effect: Each time an enemy champion dies, gain 15 Mana. Casting abilities does not consume Mana. All enemies lose 10 Armor and Magic Resist.

traits.name: Heroic
traits.effect: Galio cannot be fielded in combat. Instead, his traits count from the bench and when Demacians Rally, he joins the fight. On landing, he creates a 3-hex shockwave that deals 12% of his max Health as magic damage. Enemies hit are knocked up for 1.5 seconds, reduced by distance from the center.

traits.name: HexMech
traits.effect: Gain a Pilot Hex. Combat Start: the unit within jumps into T-Hex, granting her 80% of their Health and bonus stats based on their role and star level. On death, the pilot ejects while T-Hex knocks back and Stuns nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds.

traits.name: Huntress
traits.effect: While your strongest Neeko is alive, your strongest Nidalee cannot be targeted by basic attacks and gains 50% Durability.

traits.name: Immortal
traits.effect: While Xin Zhao is not on your board, Zaahen gains the Ionia, Demacia, and Warden traits. On kill, Zaahen gains a stack of Determination for the rest of combat. If he has 3 or more Determination when dying, he spends it to revive and restore 60% max Health.

traits.name: Ionia
traits.effect: Ionians gain Shield, Attack Damage, and Ability Power. Each game, they walk a different path. 0

path.Path of Spirit: Ionians gain bonus HP. When one casts, they gain stacking AD and AP.
path.Path of Generosity: Every third takedown Ionians participate in grants 1 gold. Ionians gain AD and AP, increased by 1% for every gold earned this way.
path.Path of Enlightenment: Ionians gain AD and AP plus more based on your level. After each player combat, gain XP.
path.Path of Transcendence: Ionians gain bonus Health and deal bonus magic damage. These effects increase if theyre three-starred.
path.Path of Precision: Ionian abilities can critically strike and they gain Critical Strike Chance. Whenever an Ionian casts, Ionian units gain stacking AD and AP.

tiers.bonus: 0% Health Shield, 0% Attack Damage & Ability Power
0% Health Shield, 0% Attack Damage & Ability Power
0% Health Shield, 0% Attack Damage & Ability Power

traits.name: Ixtal
traits.effect: Completing a Quest grants you a new one at the start of next round.

tiers.bonus: Complete Quests to earn Sunshards (%i:Set16Ixtal%) and spend them for loot!
Heal 2 player health at the start of each player combat.
After winning combat, find 50 %i:Set16Ixtal% and unearth bonus loot.

traits.name: Noxus
traits.effect: After the enemy team has lost 15% of their Health, summon Atakhan, Bringer of Ruin. Each Noxian champion's star level increases his power.

tiers.bonus: He slashes enemies, dealing magic damage.
Noxians get more powerful the longer he is alive.
He drains the souls of enemies on cast.

traits.name: Piltover
traits.effect: Build an invention on the right side of the board. After 8 seconds, the invention activates, triggering each of its Modules.

traits.name: Riftscourge
traits.effect: Baron Nashor takes up 2 team slots and grants +2 to the Void trait. After 8 seconds, the board enters a Void Rift. The Rift grants Void units 30% Damage Amp and constantly strikes enemies with bolts of plasma, dealing 5% max Health as magic damage.

traits.name: Rune Mage
traits.effect: The Rune Mage benefits from all active Region traits, but contributes to none. He harnesses the Runic power from active Region traits to modify his Ability, enhancing it in unique ways.

traits.name: Shadow Isles
traits.effect: Whenever ANY champion dies, gain Souls (Soul). Shadow Isles champions' Abilities are uniquely empowered based on the number of Souls you have. Shadow Isles champions gain Attack Damage and Ability Power. Souls Collected: 0 Soul

traits.name: Shurima
traits.effect: Each second, Shurimans gain 2% Attack Speed and restore 20 Health. At combat start, they gain additional effects.

tiers.bonus: A Shuriman ascends to GODHOOD every 3 seconds.

traits.name: Soulbound
traits.effect: Lucian and Senna fight together, swapping when either casts. Each champion has a unique ability. Your strongest Soulbound pair grants bonuses to your team. While Senna is out, all allies gain 7% Damage Reduction. While Lucian is out, all allies gain 7% Damage Amp.

traits.name: Star Forger
traits.effect: Aurelion Sol gains 40% increased Stardust for each other unique Targonian fielded in combat. Current Bonus: 0%

traits.name: Targon
traits.effect: Targonians are forged by the stars. They are traitless, but stronger than the average champion.

traits.name: The Boss
traits.effect: When Sett first drops below 45% max Health, he leaves combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores 15% max Health and gives him 60% Attack and Move Speed. If he reaches full Health, he returns to combat Pumped Up, converting all damage from his attacks and Ability to true damage. If all of his allies die, he immediately returns to combat.

traits.name: Void
traits.effect: Gain Mutations that only Void champions can use. Void champions gain Attack Speed. Champions can only have one Mutation at a time. Benching a champion removes their Mutation.

tiers.bonus: Mutations become supercharged, increasing their power by 50%. 40% Attack Speed

traits.name: World Ender
traits.effect: Aatrox gains Attack Damage equal to his Omnivamp. On first death, he becomes briefly untargetable and heals back to full Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, he reduces his maximum Mana by 20 and gains 25% Durability.

tiers.bonus: Yordles gain 50 Health and 5% Attack Speed for each Yordle fielded. 3 star Yordles grant 50% more!
AND your first shop each round has a Yordle in it!
AND get 2 free rerolls each round!
AND get a Yordle Grab Bag each round!

traits.name: Zaun
traits.effect: After 4 seconds, Zaunites become Shimmer-Fused, granting them 10% Durability and 90% decaying Attack Speed for 4 seconds. After a short cooldown, they become Shimmer-Fused again.

tiers.bonus: At 60% Health, Zaunites restore 25% Health over 3 seconds and instantly become Shimmer-Fused.
Shimmer-Fused bonuses are increased by 30%. Refresh after 3 seconds instead.

traits.name: Arcanist
traits.effect: Your team gains Ability Power, Arcanists gain more.

tiers.bonus: 18 Ability Power, 25 Ability Power for Arcanists
25 Ability Power, 45 Ability Power for Arcanists
40 Ability Power, 70 Ability Power for Arcanists

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.effect: Your team gains 150 maximum Health. Bruisers gain more.

traits.name: Defender
traits.effect: Your team gains 12 Armor and Magic Resist. Defenders gain more.

traits.name: Disruptor
traits.effect: Disruptors' abilities Dazzle enemies hit. Disruptors deal bonus damage to Dazzled enemies. Dazzle: Reduce damage dealt by 10%

traits.name: Gunslinger
traits.effect: Gunslingers gain Attack Damage. Every 4th attack from Gunslingers deals bonus physical damage.

traits.name: Invoker
traits.effect: Your team gains 1 Mana Regen. Invokers gain more Mana from all sources.

traits.name: Juggernaut
traits.effect: Juggernauts gain Durability, increased while above 50% health. When a Juggernaut dies, other Juggernauts heal for 5% of their max Health.

traits.name: Longshot
traits.effect: Longshots gain Damage Amp and deal more damage to targets farther away.

traits.name: Quickstriker
traits.effect: Your team gains 15% Attack Speed. Quickstrikers gain bonus Attack Speed based on their target's missing Health.

traits.name: Slayer
traits.effect: Slayers gain Omnivamp and Attack Damage. They increase the bonus Attack Damage by up to 50% based on their missing Health.

traits.name: Vanquisher
traits.effect: Vanquishers' abilities can critically strike. They also gain Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

tiers.bonus: 15% Critical Strike Chance, 15% Critical Strike Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance, 20% Critical Strike Damage
25% Critical Strike Chance, 25% Critical Strike Damage
30% Critical Strike Chance, 30% Critical Strike Damage

traits.name: Warden
traits.effect: When Wardens first drop below 75% and 25% Health, they gain a Shield based on their max Health.
